text: Stokkøy Bridge () is a concrete cantilever bridge that crosses the Stokksundet strait between the mainland and the island of Stokkøya in the municipality of Åfjord in Trøndelag county, Norway. The bridge starts near the village of Revsnes on the mainland and goes north to the island of Stokkøya near the village of Harsvika. The bridge was opened in December 2000. The bridge has six spans, the longest of which is . The clearance to the sea beneath the bridge is . Stokkøy Bridge cost around to build. ==See also== *List of bridges in Norway *List of bridges in Norway by length *List of bridges *List of longest bridges in the world ==References== ==External links== *Construction of Stokkøy Bridge *Construction of the bridge *A picture of Stokkøy Bridge Category:Åfjord Category:Bridges completed in 2000 Category:Road bridges in Trøndelag Category:2000 establishments in Norway
title: Stokkøy Bridge
